Title: E: The Movie
Writer: Rohan A. Bajaj (original story), Rohan A. Bajaj (screenplay), Harikumar (screenplay), Anwar Hussain (dialogue), Hari Kumar Krishnamoorthy (screenplay), Deepu Mathew (dialogue), Amin Surani (original story)
Actors: Gautami, Meera Nair, Nithya Naresh, Kalyani Vidya
Plot: Karthik makes a documentary on Alzheimer's disease. His subject, Malathi Menon, lives in a small town outside Harippad with her daughter Athira. Karthik and his team arrives at Malathi's place and start noticing her inexplicable behavior.
